content.rendered:
In compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), which comes into effect today, we have updated our Privacy Policy. If you have given us your email address by subscribing to our news posts then this is all we will use it for. You do not need to do anything but you may of course unsubscribe at any time. In accordance with the GDPR you may also request that we delete your personal information from our records entirely.

Please see our updated Privacy Policy here for more details on how your personal information may be used.
